name: Ekylure 2
description:
Ekylure 2 est un mélange entre un rogue like, et un tower defense.

CONTROLS :

ZQSD + FLECHE DIRECTIONELLES

E pour activer les items

F ou R pour la console

Commande de la console

spawn turret / spawn tourelle;

spawn saw /spawn scie;

spawn bat / spawn chauvesouris;

spawn champi / spawn mushroom;

spawn skeleton /spawn squelette;

spawn slime;

spawn fellow /spawn bonhomme;

spawn bossTV /spawn bosstv;

spawn bossMonstro /spawn bossmonstro;

spawn bossMetal /spawn bossmetal;

gold; = +1000 gold
